issue.title: [R] bindings for strptime
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12198](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12198). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12198?focusedCommentId=17340310) by Alenka Frim (alenka):*
I would like to have a go at this issue pls.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12198?focusedCommentId=17340355) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
We always appreciate contributions, welcome! We've assigned the ticket to you (though that's a formality at most). 

Let us know if you have any questions, or would like pointers / links to previous PRs that implemented similar bindings.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12198?focusedCommentId=17341271) by Alenka Frim (alenka):*
Thank you `[~jonkeane]`! 

I'm working on it and will let u know if I have any questions.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12198?focusedCommentId=17357598) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10334
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10334>
